mapper.select: select DISTINCT `name` from group_member,`group` where `group`.id = group_member.group_id and `group_member`.username = #{username}
select `from` as fromName,message from all_message where group_id = #{groupId} order by id
select `from` as fromName,message from all_message where (`from` = #{fromName} and `to` = #{toName}) or (`to` = #{toName} and `from` = #{fromName}) order by id
